feed.title: QR code alternatives (was: Proposal: extend bip70 with OpenAlias)

entry.title: QR code alternatives (was: Proposal: extend bip70 with OpenAlias)
entry.summary: The advanced QR code standards could potentially be useful without any changes to BIP7x. If more data can be added without affecting scanning performance, it's possible that the current data set can be maintained while still improving scanning capabilities.
